failure_mode: Battery cooling pump failure leading to thermal runaway near-miss

root_cause.primary: Coolant pump bearing wear due to manufacturing contamination
contributing_factors: Insufficient incoming inspection of pump components
No vibration monitoring in early pump wear detection

corrective_actions.action: Add vibration signature monitoring to predictive maintenance

preventive_actions.action: Enhanced incoming inspection for coolant pump assemblies
Supplier process audit for bearing cleanliness

verification.method: Accelerated life testing and field monitoring
verification.result: No recurrence in 6 months of production

lessons_learned: Early detection of pump bearing wear through motor current signature analysis can prevent thermal events
design_feedback: Add redundant temperature sensors near battery modules closest to coolant inlet

failure_mode: Cell voltage imbalance causing premature capacity fade

root_cause.primary: BMS cell balancing algorithm not optimized for cold climate charging
contributing_factors: Insufficient testing in sub-zero temperature conditions
Balancing timeout too short during cold charge sessions

corrective_actions.action: Update BMS balancing algorithm for cold temperature operation
OTA update deployment to affected vehicles

preventive_actions.action: Expand cold climate test protocol for BMS software

verification.method: Field data monitoring of cell balance in cold regions

lessons_learned: Temperature-dependent algorithms require testing across full operating envelope
design_feedback: Implement adaptive balancing timeout based on cell temperature

failure_mode: Motor resolver drift causing hesitation during acceleration

root_cause.primary: Resolver mounting adhesive degradation at high temperatures
contributing_factors: Adhesive cure time specification not adequate for high-volume production
High motor temperature events accelerating adhesive aging

corrective_actions.action: Change to high-temperature grade epoxy adhesive
Add resolver drift monitoring to predictive model

preventive_actions.action: Material specification update for all motor mount adhesives

verification.method: Accelerated thermal cycling test and field monitoring
verification.result: Zero failures with new adhesive in 50000 units

lessons_learned: Motor adhesive materials must be validated at worst-case thermal conditions including aggressive driving profiles
design_feedback: Consider mechanical resolver retention as primary, adhesive as secondary

failure_mode: Brake drag causing premature pad wear and overheating

root_cause.primary: Caliper piston seal swell due to incompatible brake fluid additive
contributing_factors: New brake fluid supplier with different additive package
Insufficient compatibility testing with seal material

detection_method: Higher than expected brake pad warranty claims

corrective_actions.action: Revert to previous brake fluid specification
Affected vehicles recalled for brake system inspection

preventive_actions.action: All fluid changes require seal compatibility validation
Add brake temperature monitoring to anomaly detection

verification.method: 100% inspection of affected vehicles, field monitoring
verification.result: All affected units serviced, no further occurrences

lessons_learned: Supplier changes for lubricants and fluids require full compatibility validation
design_feedback: Add brake drag detection via motor current signature analysis during coasting

failure_mode: Inverter IGBT failure under repeated high-power acceleration

root_cause.primary: Thermal cycling fatigue of IGBT solder layer
contributing_factors: Higher than expected number of launch control activations
Solder joint design margin insufficient for aggressive drivers

corrective_actions.action: Redesign IGBT module with enhanced thermal cycling capability
Add thermal cycling counter to predictive maintenance

preventive_actions.action: Usage-based warranty tracking for high-stress components

verification.method: Accelerated thermal cycling validation of new design

lessons_learned: Customer usage patterns for performance vehicles exceed development cycle test profiles
design_feedback: Increase IGBT thermal cycling margin by 50% for performance variants

failure_mode: 12V battery drain causing vehicle no-start condition

root_cause.primary: Software bug causing phantom wake events during deep sleep
contributing_factors: Edge case in cellular modem sleep state machine
Insufficient integration testing of sleep/wake transitions

corrective_actions.action: Fix cellular modem sleep state machine bug
Deploy OTA fix with rollback capability

verification.method: Field telemetry monitoring for phantom wake events
verification.result: 99% reduction in phantom wakes after OTA

lessons_learned: Vehicle sleep state testing must include all connected modules and edge case transitions
design_feedback: Implement 12V battery health prediction based on charge/discharge patterns

failure_mode: Regenerative braking inconsistency causing unexpected deceleration variation

root_cause.primary: Brake blending algorithm oscillation at specific speed/SOC combinations
contributing_factors: PID tuning not optimized for all operating conditions
Sensor noise causing control instability

detection_method: Customer feedback and social media monitoring

corrective_actions.action: Add sensor noise filtering to brake pressure input

preventive_actions.action: Brake blending test cases for edge operating conditions

verification.method: Customer satisfaction survey and field data analysis

lessons_learned: Subjective driving feel issues require extensive diverse driver testing
design_feedback: Implement adaptive brake blending based on driver preference learning

failure_mode: Heat pump refrigerant leak in cold climate conditions

root_cause.primary: Thermal contraction of refrigerant line fitting beyond design tolerance
contributing_factors: Fitting torque specification at lower limit
Extreme cold temperature (-30°C) exposure

detection_method: Service network feedback from cold regions

corrective_actions.action: Add refrigerant pressure monitoring to diagnostics

verification.method: Cold climate field trial with new torque spec

lessons_learned: Refrigerant system must be validated at extreme temperature cycling conditions
design_feedback: Consider spring-loaded fitting design for thermal expansion tolerance

failure_mode: SOC estimation error after fast charging sessions

root_cause.primary: Coulomb counting drift accumulation not corrected during DC fast charge
contributing_factors: OCV-based correction disabled during fast charging
Extended fast charging sessions compounding drift

preventive_actions.action: Add SOC deviation monitoring to predictive analytics

lessons_learned: Battery estimation algorithms must maintain accuracy across all charging use cases
design_feedback: Implement adaptive calibration triggers based on usage patterns

failure_mode: Tire wear pattern indicating alignment issues from factory

root_cause.primary: Production line alignment equipment calibration drift
contributing_factors: Calibration interval too long for high-volume production
No statistical process control on alignment measurements

detection_method: Warranty claims for premature tire replacement

corrective_actions.action: Offer free alignment check to affected customers

lessons_learned: High-volume production requires tighter process monitoring
design_feedback: Consider adding vehicle-based alignment monitoring via steering angle sensor
